title: Employee Work Premises
completedHtml:
Thank you for completing this survey and providing your feedback.

Your feedback will help us implement a better and safer work environment for your organization

elements.name: general_feedback
elements.title: General Feedback
elements.description: Please provide any feedback that you believe might be helpful into making your work environment safer and healthier for you and your colleagues.

pages.title: Employee Work Premises
pages.description: The objective of this check-list is to gather information to improve the working conditions of men and women in various industries and therefore reduce the number of accidents and health related issues.
